title: Guidance: EEA and Swiss nationals: free movement rights
text:
Guidance on the free movement rights of European Economic Area (EEA) and Swiss nationals. Document PDF , 219KB , 25 pages This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology. Request an accessible format. If you use assistive technology (such as a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email . Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use. Detail 
UK Visas and Immigration modernised guidance for how it considers the free movement rights of nationals of the EEA and Swiss nationals, and who can enter and live in the UK under European Community (EC) law. Published:
